item.title: Galapagos tortoise celebrates 135th birthday and first Father's Day at Zoo Miami
item.description: A South Florida zoo’s oldest resident is celebrating his 135th birthday and his first Father’s Day

item.title: Authorities still searching for suspect in shooting of 2 Minnesota state lawmakers
item.description: A massive search is stretching into its second day for a man who authorities say posed as a police officer and fatally shot a Democratic state lawmake...

item.title: Winning numbers drawn in Saturday’s Powerball
item.description: The winning numbers in Saturday evening’s drawing of the "Powerball" game were: 04-06-09-23-59, Powerball: 25

item.title: Medicaid enrollees fear losing health coverage if Congress enacts work requirements
item.description: The prospect of a work requirement for able-bodied Medicaid recipients is sparking fears

item.title: The Army turns 250. Trump turns 79. Cue funnel cakes, festive bling, military might — and protest
item.description: There were funnel cakes, stands of festival bling and American flags aplenty
